EmailTemplate.name: Victor Email 1.Victor Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Quick Introduction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
My name is Victor. Yesterday I reached out to you regarding masks, so I wanted to take the chance to officially introduce myself. I'm new to the Grand & Toy team and I've been assigned to support your company's account.
I’ve been spending some time learning more about your company and I’m excited to support you on the necessary solutions that your business needs to stay safe and productive.
I’d love to meet over the phone to connect. Would you be open to a quick chat?
Thanks,
Victor Cheung Inside Account Manager
We have the business solutions to help you operate in the new normal.
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: VictorCheung@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:VictorCheung@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 416-401-6300 ext. 86406 | Web: grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
LinkedIn: : https://www.linkedin.com/in/victor-cheung-23603878 <[[https://www.linkedin.com/in/victor-cheung-23603878]]> Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
